policystore

Class SimplePolicyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • policystore.AbstractStore
      • policystore.SimplePolicyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyStore

    @Service
public class SimplePolicyStore
extends AbstractStore
implements PolicyStore
    Creates a simple policy store using a Hash map.
